molecules.name: Iso E Super
molecules.description: Synthetic woody polycyclic compound with cedar-like, slightly fruity nuances. Extremely versatile in fine fragrance. Known for excellent tenacity and blending properties. Non-flammable, soluble in most fragrance bases.
molecules.organoleptic: Woody, cedar, slightly fruity, warm, persistent

molecules.name: Hedione
molecules.description: Aromatic white crystalline compound with jasmine-like floral character. Excellent tenacity and diffusion. Creates transparent floral effect. Widely used in high-end fragrances. UV and heat stable.

molecules.name: Ambroxan
molecules.description: Synthetic ambergris replacement with warm, musky-woody character. Excellent fixative with very high tenacity. Odorless when alone, creates depth in compositions. Perfect for oriental and amber fragrances.

molecules.name: Galaxolide
molecules.description: Polycyclic synthetic musk with soft, clean, powdery character. Excellent fixative with long-lasting effect. Creates clean, laundry-like notes. Widely used in personal care products. Good stability.

molecules.name: Ethyl Linalool
molecules.description: Synthetic lilac and flower compound with fresh, green-floral character. Very versatile for creating lilac and violet notes. Excellent diffusion. Stable in various formulations. Used in fragrances and cosmetics.

molecules.name: Anisaldehyde
molecules.description: Synthetic compound with strong anise and licorice notes. Powerful character with spicy-warm profile. Used to create oriental and spicy fragrances. Excellent blending properties. Heat and light stable.

molecules.name: Dimethyl Anthranilate
molecules.description: Synthetic compound with grape and fruity character. Creates juicy, fruity effects in perfumes. Excellent for cocktail and fruity fragrances. Soluble in fragrance bases. Good stability.

molecules.name: Methyl Anthranilate
molecules.description: Classic grape compound with intense fruity, jammy character. Essential for fruity fragrances and flavorings. Creates authentic grape notes. Soluble in fragrance bases. Excellent tenacity.

molecules.name: Ethyl Cinnamate
molecules.description: Synthetic cinnamon ester with sweet, spicy, warm character. Creates authentic cinnamon notes in fragrances. Excellent for oriental and spicy compositions. Good solubility and stability.

molecules.name: Ethyl 2-Methylbutyrate
molecules.description: Fruity ester with apple and tropical fruity character. Creates juicy fruity effects. Excellent for fresh fruity fragrances. Good diffusion and tenacity. Soluble in most bases.

part: Part 4: Woody, Floral, Amber, Musky, Spicy, Fruity (Expanded with descriptions)
